de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.init

Class EncoderSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.init.EncoderSettings

  • public class EncoderSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    EncoderSettings defines the properties of an IEncoder, which shall be used by the current application. The definition is used in startup to initialize the encoders, so that they can be requested by the method IDataStore.getEncoder(String)
